name: Political Turbulence
title: Least Politically Stable Nation
description: In 2023, Mali ranked at the bottom with a political stability percentile of 2.84, indicating significant challenges in maintaining peace and order.

name: Women's Health Crisis
title: High Anemia Rates Among Pregnant Women
description: In 2019, 59% of pregnant women in Mali were affected by anemia, highlighting a critical public health issue.

name: Gender Inequality Struggles
title: High Acceptance of Domestic Violence
description: In 2018, 68.5% of women believed a husband is justified in beating his wife for arguing, and 62.8% for refusing sex, reflecting deep-rooted gender inequality.

name: Limited Female Empowerment
title: Low Female Autonomy in Health Decisions
description: Only 5.3% of women aged 15-49 in 2018 made informed decisions regarding sexual relations and reproductive health, indicating limited autonomy.

name: Youthful Demographics
title: Predominantly Young Female Population
description: In 2023, only 2.41% of the female population was aged 50-54, and 1.38% aged 60-64, suggesting a predominantly young demographic.
